title: Database Schema Design for Roles
description: Design and create database tables for roles, permissions, and user-role relationships. Establish the data model foundation for the RBAC system.

phases.title: Database Analysis and Schema Planning
phases.description: Analyze RBAC requirements and plan the complete database schema structure including entity relationships and constraints.

phases.title: Core Tables Design
phases.description: Design and define the core tables for roles and permissions with proper field types, constraints, and relationships.
deliverables: Roles table schema with id, name, description, created_at, updated_at fields
Permissions table schema with id, name, resource, action, description fields
Field validation rules and data types

phases.title: Junction Tables Design
phases.description: Design the many-to-many relationship tables (role_permissions and user_roles) with proper foreign keys and cascade rules.
deliverables: Foreign key constraints and cascade rules

phases.title: Migration Script Creation
phases.description: Create comprehensive database migration scripts for schema creation with rollback capabilities and version control.

phases.title: Seed Data and Testing
phases.description: Create seed data for default roles and permissions, and test the complete schema for data integrity.
deliverables: Seed data for default roles (admin, user, moderator)
